name: General Cancer - yes - weightloss, fatigue, pain

speech: Thank you for sharing. Based on your symptoms, Cancer, known as 'Arbuda' in Ayurveda, may be a concern. In Ayurveda, recommended herbs include Ashwagandha and Tulsi. The ancient Ayurvedic texts like Charaka Samhita and Sushruta Samhita provide insights into managing Cancer. Its pharmacological properties include a Tikta (bitter) taste, Guru (heavy) qualities, Ushna (hot) potency, and Katu (pungent) Vipaka. For relief, you might consider Cisplatin and Tamoxifen as suggested drugs.
